## Your Turn: Be the Buoy

:::{.gray-container}
**Materials Needed:**
- 1 test strip
:::

Now, let's build a model that is very similar to the one used in the buoy. We will repeat the process of training a model with Teachable Machine. This time we will have two classes: "strip present" and "strip not present".
